text: AVA: Wow! What an awful day! Everything's gone wrong today!
CINDY: That's why I, Captain Cynthia "Cindy" Palisade of the Starbase Chip, have called you all here today. In the Small Magellanic
Cloud, we're so far from Earth, but since the no-communication theorem has been lifted, I know you've all heard the news.
AVA: Earth?! My food replicator's been out all day and no one has done anything to fix it! I don't even remember which planet Earth is!
